name: Spearfishing Hunting Xtreme
description:
Excellent realistic 3D spearfishing game for mobile . Grab your mask and snorkel and go diving underwater, hunting an assorted collection of fish and animals with your speargun.

In your hunting diving adventure your will find a vast assortment of underwater fish to hunt such as:
- Sharks
- Koi
- Eels
- Squid

FEATURES
# Amazing 3D graphics and effects
# Realsitic spearfishing experience
# Dangerous animals

Spearfishing underwater hunter is the to the most exciting sea sport adventure in the appstore!

Take your harpoon and shoot your prey!
